title: Companion Approval Guide
content: Thay. Attack Goblin Camp. Volunteer to torture Liam at Goblin Camp. Agree to play chicken chase, at the Goblin Camp, then convince the Owlbear to kill the goblins (“Animal handling: turn his gaze to the goblins – they deserve to die”) Feed Owlbear at the Camp. Decline when Halsin asks to kill Goblin leaders. Laugh/Roar at Lorin (elf in Ethel's house) by pretending that you are the monster he sees. Choose to kill Kagha without trying to persuade her. Choose to spare Auntie Ethel when they surrend
